item.title: Using AndroidSVG with ImageView
item.description: <pre class="prism-highlight line-numbers" data-start="1">```null public class MainActivity extends Activity { @Override protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); ImageView imageView = (ImageView) findViewById(R.id.yourImageView); imageView.setLayerType(View.LAYER_TYPE_SOFTWARE, null); try { SVG svg = SVG.getFromResource(this, R.raw.my_svg_file); Drawable drawable = new PictureDrawable(svg.renderToPicture()); imageView.setImageDrawable(drawable); } catch(SVGParseException e) {} } } å&#156;°å&#157;&#128;:http://bigbadaboom.github.io/androidsvg/use\_with\_ImageView.html Github:https://github.com/BigBadaboom/androidsvg
